title: Describe charges of three spheres in a line

content.description: Three small spheres, A, B, and C, have charges with magnitudes qA, qB, and qC, respectively.The three spheres are aligned along a straight line, as shown in the figure above. At the instant shown, the net force on sphere A is zero.
content.question: Which of the following statements must be true of the signs of the charges?

choices.label: Only charges qA and qB have the same sign.
Only charges qA and qC have the same sign.
Only charges qB and qC have the same sign.
Charges qB and qC have different signs.
Charges qA, qB, and qC all have the same sign.

content.answer: Charges qB and qC have different signs.
